* Purpose of this script is to do imputation on the vcf file of 505 SNP data. I will be using beagle 5.0 for this purpose 

### get beagle
wget https://faculty.washington.edu/browning/beagle/beagle.28Sep18.793.jar 

### running beagle 
* make a ref file from vcf to .bref3 ? Beagle will also accept reference files in Variant Call
Format (.vcf) and gzip-compressed VCF format (.vcf.gz). 

java -Xmx5g -jar beagle.28Sep18.793.jar gt=<vcf file> out=<out file prefix> ne=<effective population size> nthreads <number of threads>
